short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to collect, categorize, and organize your notes or code snippets.
short.es: Una extensión de Chrome para recopilar, categorizar y organizar tus notas o fragmentos de código.
short.fr: Une extension Chrome pour collecter, classer et organiser vos notes ou extraits de code.
short.hi: अपने नोट्स या कोड स्निपेट्स को संग्रहित, वर्गीकृत और व्यवस्थित करने के लिए क्रोम एक्सटेंशन।
short.zh_CN: 一个 Chrome 扩展，用于收集、分类和组织您的笔记或代码片段。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pin Point Note 2.0: Your Ultimate Tool for Effortless Note and Code Snippet Management

Pin Point Note is the perfect solution for developers, writers, students, and anyone who needs to capture, categorize, and organize notes or code snippets efficiently. With version 2.0, we've introduced the ability to add titles to your notes, making it easier than ever to understand and retrieve important information at a glance.

Key Features:
1. Create and Organize Notes with Titles: Add meaningful titles to your notes for better clarity and quick identification.
2. Customizable, Color-Coded Tags: Organize your notes using a variety of customizable, color-coded tags to easily categorize and access your content.
3. Effortless Note Management: Scrollable lists and a user-friendly interface help you manage your notes with ease.
4. Back to Top Button: Navigate your notes effortlessly with a handy "Back to Top" button for quick access.
5. Responsive Design: Optimized for all screen sizes, ensuring a seamless experience on any device.
6. Persistent Storage: Seamlessly integrated with Chrome storage to save your notes across sessions, so your information is always available when you need it.

Why Choose Pin Point Note?
1. Enhanced Productivity: Save time by quickly accessing and reusing your frequently used notes and code snippets.
2. User-Friendly Interface: Lightweight, fast, and designed for efficiency, making it an essential tool for organizing your information.
3. Perfect for Developers and Students: Whether you're managing code snippets, syntax, or important notes, Pin Point Note helps streamline your workflow.

Built by Ashish Ingle
For inquiries, contact: ashishingle589@gmail.com

Keywords:
Note-taking, Code snippets, Syntax storage, Productivity tool, Chrome extension, Organize notes, Quick notes, Developer tools, Bookmark manager, Syntax snippets
